data.title: New Favorite!
data.text: Came here twice this week. We were brought here by friends on the first visit and totally enjoyed the food. Then we booked the big table for lunch two days later. Service was wonderful with Nina, the assistant manager in charge. Prices reasonable and food delicious! I especially liked their 'pots', one being the salted fish, chicken, and egg plant pot. We also tried a Peking duck on the second visit. Carved table-side, fresh and tasty. I think this will be my new favorite restaurant in SGV from now on. Ample free parking at the parking structure behind the restaurant.

data.title: Nice new Chinese Restaurant in Alhambra
data.text: The food is very good and the portions are large.  With minimum purchase, you can get a free dish.  We got the free lobster.  The restaurant is spacious and is very nicely decorated with comfortable seats.  The prices are reasonable and comparabe to good Chinese restaurants in the San Gabriel Valley.
